ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard otherwise about anti camp code. The Ogre Shadowknight is supposedly anti camp, it you are in front of the spikes, he won t show. Belgarth ...
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard otherwise about anti camp code. The Ogre
Shadowknight is supposedly anti camp, it you are in
front of the spikes, he won't show.

Belgarth

--- IDS <ids@...> wrote:
> From: "IDS" <ids@...>
>
>
> > From: Doug Sorensen
> <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >
> > A necro friend said he just put in 48 hours to
> get
> > those boots. Haven't heard anything about reducing
> the
> > time. Could there be anti-camp zones like some
> other
> > mobs perhaps?
>
> There is no anti-camp vode in this game. You should
> sit in the room not the
> little corridor because sitting in the corridor
> pulls moosh from the
> basement cells.
>
> I got my boots on my second visit, luckyly in about
> 4 hours, 2 boots spawned
> back to back so the magician that was with me got a
> pair too.
>
